physical_appearance: This is a figural sculpture raised on a stump. The figure stands with his/her leg apart, and arms around the hips. The body is darkened brown, while the shoulder and head of the figure is of a lighter brown.
subject_terms_2: Art, Dayak  Dayak (Indonesian people)  Ancestor worship  Protection magic  Figurative art Sculpture  Fetishes (Ceremonial objects)
